Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

Deck

public Deck()
Construct a full deck of cards and shuffle them.

Method Detail

act

public void act()
Deals a card when this deck is clicked on, placing it face-up in the upper-left corner of the world. This only deals one card per click, no matter how long the click lasts. The deck should be removed from the world when empty so the player doesn't try drawing a card from an empty deck.

Overrides:
act in class greenfoot.Actor

dealCard

public Card dealCard()
Deal a card. That card will no longer be available in this deck. The caller is responsible for making sure the deck is not empty.

Returns:
a card that has not yet been dealt from this deck

hasCards

public boolean hasCards()
Check whether this deck contains any more cards.

Returns:
true if the deck has more cards, false otherwise
